ğŸš€ CRAPTCHA - VTOP Enhancer v2.0.0

  Changelog:
- 1.0: Initial Release for v2.vitbhopal.ac.in
- 1.1: Updated for new vitbhopal.ac.in page (v2 version discontinued)
- 1.2: Added Total Marks Enhancement and Attendance Calculator
- 1.3: Temporarily removed Captcha Parser functionality
- 2.0.0: Major update with significant improvements

                                             ğŸ‰ What's New in 2.0.0:

 ğŸ§  Captcha Parser is Back!
- Improved accuracy to 90%
- New "Paste Captcha" button for manual control
- Auto-refresh feature for captcha block visibility issues

 ğŸ“± Offline Mode
- Save and access key information without internet:
  - Attendance
  - Marks
  - Timetable
- Easter egg: #letusrockVITBlions

 ğŸ“… Enhanced Timetable
- New table design for easy viewing

 ğŸ› ï¸ Bug Fixes & Improvements
- Fixed captcha box visibility issue

 ğŸŒŸ Existing Features:
- 9 custom themes to personalize your VTOP experience

 ğŸš€ Elevate Your VTOP Experience!
Designed by VIT Bhopal students, for VIT Bhopal students. Transform your online academic journey with CRAPTCHA!

 ğŸ“… Note from the Dev - 

- 1st of all, captcha parser is back. I know  it's been a while, but I'm still working for a 100% accurate offline js lib. that can do it. For now, we'll rely on, with what we have.
- Improved accuracy of the captcha parser to 90%. it'll still get a few words wrong here and there,  so I have added a paste captcha button for you to manually decide if it's the kindof captcha you want to be pasted in the input box..
(P.S. - you can always refresh the page, you know)
 - Also , added an offline button that saves the page's value , and stores it for when you don't wanna open the website for little things, like - 
there's also an easter egg hidden in the button (#letlionsroar) Pages including attendance , marks , and timetable.
- Added a new table for timetable page, making it easy to  download your timetable as a jpg file. Will add and xlsx button later. do let me know your thoughts on it.
- Also fixed an annoying bug , where the captcha box doesn't show up , and one has to manually refresh the site. It'll auto refresh the page, until the captcha block shows up.
that's it for now... will do minor improvements slowly. I know i haven't released the source code yet, only the crx files. will do once i graduate from VIT.
for now this is me signing off
